text: Alia Bhatt Kapoor born and known professionally as Alia Bhatt primarily appears in Bollywood films. Although she debuted as a child artist in Sangharsh (1999), she made her career debut as a leading actress in a romantic-comedy-drama Student of the Year in 2012, which won Filmfare award for Best Debut Female nomination. Subsequently, Alia further starred in and received critical acclaim for her performance in several commercially successful films including Highway (2014), Udta Punjab (2016) and Raazi (2018). In addition to acting in films, Bhatt is celebrity endorser of several brands and products. She is seen performing in various stage shows and award shows and has also sung many of her songs in films as a playback singer. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian models Category:Indian singers Category:Bollywood playback singers Category:Actors from Mumbai
title: Alia Bhatt
